hero.title: Hi, I'm Vedem Bhargav Reddy
hero.subtitle: Java Full Stack Developer
hero.description:
Building scalable and efficient web applications with Java, Spring Boot, and Angular.
Based in Bengaluru, India.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a highly motivated and detail-oriented Java Full Stack Developer with 3.5 years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable and efficient web applications.

Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Microservices, and front-end technologies such as Angular, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. I have experience working with cloud platforms like Microsoft Azure and have contributed to critical projects involving supply chain optimization and AI-driven applications.

tasks: Developed responsive web applications and reusable UI components using Angular.
Built and maintained server-side logic with Spring Boot REST APIs.
Implemented secure authentication and authorization features.
Designed and optimized database schemas, performing data modelling, normalization, and denormalization.
Configured and maintained CI/CD pipelines and deployed applications to Microsoft Azure.
Developed a reusable Angular charting library using C3 Charts and Apache ECharts.

projects.title: SCOT (Supply Chain Control Tower)
projects.desc: A centralized platform that offers real-time monitoring, visibility, and control over supply chain operations.
projects.details: Contributions: Integrated with ERP, WMS, and TMS systems. Deployed SCOT in production environments.

projects.title: Cont AI
projects.desc: Provides visualization and prioritization of inbound warehouse truck activities with ML delay prediction.
projects.details: Contributions: Developed reusable charting library, Designed real-time data models and analytics structures.

projects.title: Dock Management
projects.desc: AI-driven application for license plate recognition at warehouse entry. Utilizes WebSockets to trigger events.
projects.details: Contributions: Developed APIs for system inter-operability.

certifications: Successfully cleared the IP-safe process for SCOT (Patents/Approvals)
Awarded in Tata Innovista as a prime contributor to Cont AI ("Cutting Edge Technologies")
